channel.title: The legendary pianists
channel.description:
Music by great early-twentieth century concert pianists who produced Duo-Art piano roll recordings before advent of electronic recording.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Rachmaninoff, Saint-Saens, Tchaikov
item.description: This program presents Vladimir Horowitz performing works by Rachmaninoff, Saint-Saens, Tchaikovsky and Schubert.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Chopin by Ignace Paderewski
item.description: Chopin recital by Ignace Paderewski
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Chopin, Albeniz, Debussy, Brahms
item.description: Artur Rubinstein performs works by Chopin, Albeniz, Debussy and Brahms.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Rubinstein, Chopin, Henselt
item.description: This program presents Leopold Godowski performing works by Rubinstein, Chopin, Henselt and Schumann.

item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Bach and Saint-Saens
item.description: Harold Bauer performs works by Bach and Saint-Saens.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Schubert, Pierne, Scott, Casella
item.description: A program of two-piano recitals by Harold Bauer & Ossip Gabrilowitsch, Harold Bauer & Myra Hess, Harold Bauer & Percy Grainger, in works by Schubert, Pierne, Cyril Scott, Casella and Arensky.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Grieg
item.description: Percy Grainger in a performance of Grieg's concerto.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Beethoven, Chopin, Liszt
item.description: This program features Ignace Paderewski in a "pops" concert, including Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata, Chopin's Military Polonaise, and a Liszt Hungarian Rhapsody.
item.dc:creator: Stout, Kemble, 1916-
item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Schumann and Chopin
item.description: Josef Hofmann performs works by Schumann and Chopin.

item.title: Chopin
item.description: This program presents Harold Bauer performing works by Chopin.

item.description: This program presents Ignace Paderewski performing works by Schubert, Chopin and Liszt.

item.title: Schubert, Chopin, Rachmaninoff
item.description: This program presents Ossip Gabrilowitsch performing works by Schubert, Chopin, Rachmaninoff, Sapellnikoff and himself.

item.dc:subject: Pianists

item.title: Schubert, Henselt, Sgambatti
item.description: This program presents Aurelio Giorni performing works by Schubert, Henselt, Sgambatti and Rubinstein.

item.title: Glazounov, Scriabin, Miaskowsky
item.description: This program presents Sergey Prokofiev performing works by Glazounov, Scriabin, Miaskowsky, Rimsky-Korsakov and himself.
